text.div:
This case-sensitive code system http://hl7.org/fhir/practitionerrole-employmentStatus defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
full-time Full timeThe individual is employed in a full-time capacity.
part-time Part timeThe individual is employed in a part-time capacity.
casual CasualThe individual is employed on an casual/ad-hoc basis. For example, they are available to come in when there is high demand.

name: PractitionerRoleEmploymentStatus
title: Practitioner Role Employment Status
description: This example codesystem has common employment statuses.

concept.definition: The individual is employed in a full-time capacity.
The individual is employed in a part-time capacity.
The individual is employed on an casual/ad-hoc basis.  For example, they are available to come in when there is high demand.
